article_title: Focus On Obamacare Ignores The Other Healthcare Revolution

article_metadata.description: While everyone has been busy losing their minds about Obamacare, people are missing the less visible revolution in American healthcare. This quiet revolution started years ago, and the basics are very simple: shift costs away from insurers and place them in the hands of doctors and patients. For patients (at least, [...]
article_metadata.author: Peter Lipson
